Class Adventurer

java.lang.Object
edu.ma.westfield.skillguildtracker.Adventurer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Adventurer>
public class Adventurer extends Object implements Comparable<Adventurer>
Represents an adventurer with identifying information, a role, gold earned, and a set of skills. Adventurers can be compared alphabetically by name.

      public Adventurer(String name, int age, String role, double goldEarned, List<Skill> skills)
      Creates a new adventurer with the given attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - the adventurer's name
      age - the adventurer's age
      role - the adventurer's role or class
      goldEarned - the amount of gold the adventurer has earned
      skills - the list of skills the adventurer possesses
